title: Copper Prices Top $14,500 a Ton For First Time
description: Copper prices gained as much as 11% to trade above $14,500 a ton for the first time ever Thursday afternoon. Timna Tanners from Wells Fargo talks about the rally in metals and says copper shortages were expected. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Copper prices gained as much as 11% to trade above $14,500 a ton for the first time ever Thursday afternoon. Timna Tanners from Wells Fargo talks about the rally in metals and says copper shortages were expected. (Source: Bloomberg)
